Fifty iterations of psm already performed; the output being `julio.`

```{r}
# make a copy of julio

nadia <- julio
```

```{r}
nadia <- nadia %>% 
  # stack abc + ehr long
  mutate(long = map2(
    .x = data,
    .y = match,
    ~ bind_rows(.x, .y)
  ))

  unnest() %>% 
  ungroup(cols = match) %>% 
# convert to list-column, grouped by iteration
  group_by(iteration) %>% 
  nest()
```


```{r}
# testing pivot_longer

z <- nadia[[2]][[1]] %>% pivot_longer(
  cols = id1:propensity_score1
  
)
```
